alert.note: Alert for Butte; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:54PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Butte and west central Meade Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles north of Bear Butte State Park, or 10 miles northeast of Sturgis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Butte and west central Meade Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
